text:
Hello! I am new in using HUbspot. I've browsed as many questions about cookies as I could, and still couldn't come up with a definitive answer.

What's our requirement?
We are looiking to use a third party cookie script (TrustArc) for cookie consent management.

What is our problem?
We need to block all HubSpot cookies until the user either clicks accept or decline on my TrustArc Cookie Consent Banner.

What have we done so far?
We are able to add TrustArc script in HubSpot and hide HubSpot consent banner. But still Cookies and Tracking is happeing without giving consent (Accept/Reject)

Could someone help me with the approach for this? It would be greatly appreciated!!
